Title: Crayon Shin-chan the Movie: Super Hot! The Spicy Kasukabe Dancers
Actors: Yumiko Kobayashi, Miki Narahashi, Toshiyuki Morikawa
Plot: After the Kasukabe Defence Force wins a trip to India, Shinnosuke and Bo-chan enter a suspicious general store and find a backpack that holds a terrifying secret.
